description: Dynamically update or append data with the specified fields.

number_of_fields.info: Number of fields to be added to the record.

text_key.info: Key that identifies the field to be used as the text content.

text_key_validator.info: If enabled, checks if the given 'Text Key' is present in the given 'Data'.

success.partial_list_update: Updated {updated} out of {total} data objects ({skipped} skipped)
success.single_data_update: Successfully updated data object with {fields_added} new fields

warnings.invalid_list_item: Item at index {index} is not a Data object (type: {actual_type}), skipping

errors.too_many_fields: Number of fields cannot exceed {max_fields}. Try using a Component to combine two Data.
errors.get_data_failed: Failed to extract new data fields: {error}
errors.invalid_old_data_type: old_data must be a Data object or list of Data objects. Found: {actual_type}
errors.list_item_update_failed: Failed to update item at index {index}: {error}
errors.single_data_update_failed: Failed to update single data object: {error}
errors.data_extraction_failed: Failed to extract data from attributes: {error}
errors.text_key_not_found: Text Key '{text_key}' not found in the Data keys: {available_keys}
